attributes.action: Put resources and intellegence into cracking paedophile rings which threaten the safety of our children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time that 'paedophile rings' and such monstrosities are infiltrated and the perpetrators bought to justice. We petition and demand the Prime Minister to address this matter by utilizing his resources and intelligence needed ensure the safety of our children at home and abroad from these predators.
